item.title: About me
item.author: ishanjain28@gmail.com (Ishan Jain)
item.description: My name is Ishan Jain and I am a Student and Part-Time Backend Engineer. I’ve been programming for the past 4 years and absolutely love building stuff. Currently, My Friend and I, run multiple Fintech related websites like Clonefolio. I did Front End Web Development for a short period of about a year but didn’t liked it. So, I switched my focus towards Backend and Distributed Systems and I am glad I made this choice.
